columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EXT_SHARED_W_PT_YN
columns.description: Autoreconciled external note share with patient status

columns.name: EXT_AUTH_NAME
columns.description: Autoreconciled external note author free text name

columns.name: EXT_AUTH_SERV
columns.description: Autoreconciled external note author service text

columns.name: EXT_LAST_SIGNER
columns.description: Autoreconciled external note last signer name

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The internal provider type of a note's author, mapped from the transmitted NUCC code.
